info.titleen: This health club has great facilities.
info.descko: 헬스장에 같이 다니는 제니는 어떤 옷을 입고 어떤 운동을 하고 있을까요?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: Wow, this health club has great facilities.
sentense.en_: Wow, this health club has great facilities.
sentense.ko: 와우~ 이 헬스클럽은 기구들이 아주 좋구나.

sentense.en: Yes, it does. All the members really love it.
sentense.en_: Yes, it does. All the members really love it.
sentense.ko: 응, 그래. 모든 회원이 그것을 정말 좋아해.

sentense.en: You're in great shape. You must exercise regularly.
sentense.en_: You're in great shape. You must exercise regularly.
sentense.ko: 너 몸 상태가 아주 좋구나. 넌 분명히 규칙적으로 운동을 할 거야.

sentense.en: Thanks, I exercise three times a week with my best friend, Jenny. That's her over there.
sentense.en_: Thanks, I exercise three times a week with my best friend, Jenny. That's her over there.
sentense.ko: 고마워, 난 내 가장 친한 친구 제니랑 일주일에 세 번 운동해. 저기 그녀가 있다.

sentense.en: No, she's on the stationary bike.
sentense.en_: No, she's on the stationary bike.

sentense.en: Which one is she? The one with the striped T-shirt?
sentense.en_: Which one is she? The one with the striped T-shirt?
sentense.ko: 어떤 사람이 그녀야? 줄무늬 티셔츠 입고 있는 사람?

sentense.en: The striped T-shirt? No. She's wearing a plain one.
sentense.en_: The striped T-shirt? No. She's wearing a plain one.
sentense.ko: 줄 무늬 티셔츠? 아니. 그녀는 민무늬 옷을 입고 있어.
